response.answer_text: If everything living is nothing but a form of matter, writing ‘about’ any given subject would be impossible. Since when did anyone produce a material object about something else? Only the non-material concept could accomplish that! Matter possesses an indeterminacy that only something non-material can overcome! In fact, this difference points the way to the realization that both matter and the non-material exist. Matter is subject to the senses; the non-material isn’t. So something non-material is not subject to the senses, but is only discerned by reason! And only reason can produce anything about something else.

Everything is about something else, in the following ways: Buddhists, ecologists, evolutionary biologists, many philosophers, and many physicists believe that everything is connected to everythingLanguage is analogy and metaphor, such that a particular sound and a particular set of scribbles both represent a mental concept, such as “bird,” or “yellow.”And the words “yellow bird" might be referring to that guy on the branch over there, or every yellow bird in the world

If your spouse becomes very angry because the trash was not removed, this was about something else. When ever anybody becomes distressed by circumstances, it is NEVER about those circumstances but ALWAYS about how you respond. In other words all events are about something else…the development of your consciousness…the “soul” reason.

A pen is about writing. A book is about reading. The sun coming up in the morning is about the earth rotating towards the sun so that the sun appears to come up, but actually the sun doesn’t come up. An “about” describes something else in an easy way. Like an analogy or a parable.

Your question is a good example. Despite your emphasis on the word ‘about’, it’s not about ‘about’. So what is it about? Maybe something ‘else’. Leibniz defines entelechies as souls with appetites. something like that..

The cookie is all about making the boy smile. The horse is all about growing the little girl’s confidence, skill, and knowledge. The mask is all about not infecting the old person over there. All of them are all about love.
